item.title: Hutter Prize Goal Progress Report 1
item.description:
This post is to update on my project to build a text compressor. I began this project in January 2020. My goal is to get on the Hutter Prize leaderboard. It is probably too ambitious, but I will try. It has been a great learning experience regardless.

I don't expect …
item.dc:creator: Justin Slud

item.title: About / Contact
item.description:
I'm a math and economics student at the University of Maryland. After graduation, I'll be working as a junior data scientist.

If you're reading this, I want to talk with you! You can schedule a Zoom meeting or email me.

Feel free to reach out to me about anything. I …

item.title: Wikipedia Current Events Analysis
item.description:
Please see the general info for this project on the Projects page

I split this project into 5 parts. The links are to the scripts and notebooks within this repository.

  1. Collecting the data
  2. Exploring and understanding the data
  3. Machine learning modelling
  4. Building a Flask API
  5. Making an interactive Streamlit app …
